name: Grandmars Laundry
description:
Use either the mouse or keyboard to select a slot on the clothesline and Keyboard 1-6 or the mouse to hang a clothing item up into that slot. Clothing items must match either color or type from left to right in order to Dry and be removed from the line.

Grandmars Laundry is a fast-paced matching game, where you must hang laundry on a clothesline between Earth and Mars. For each laundry pile you successfully hang, a new and larger pile follows. Can you keep up with Grandma’s Laundry or will you be returning to earth with clothes unhung? 

This game was made for the Shenanijam Game Jam over 36 hours, it’s our first ever game and we hope you enjoy it. Thank you all for checking it out! 

– Really Dangerous Games.
